add.description: Explicit API endpoint for GET /api/v1/cart to retrieve cart items, individual subtotals, and cart total must be documented in the LLD API Specifications section.
add.reason: The story summary specifies this API contract, but the LLD does not explicitly document this endpoint under API Specifications.

add.description: UI redirection logic for empty cart state (e.g., 'continue shopping' link) must be described in the LLD.
add.reason: The story summary requires this business logic, but the LLD does not mention UI redirection for empty cart.

modify.current_state: CartService.addItem validates product availability and adds item to cart, but does not specify default quantity behavior.
modify.required_change: Clarify that POST /api/v1/cart/items should default to quantity: 1 if not provided, as per story summary.
modify.reason: The story summary requires default quantity of 1 when adding a product, but the LLD does not specify this behavior.

modify.current_state: CartService.updateItem removes item if quantity <= 0, but does not specify validation for minimum quantity.
modify.required_change: Add validation to ensure quantity cannot be set below 1 except for explicit removal, matching story summary intent.
modify.reason: The story summary expects quantity updates to be validated, but the LLD does not clarify minimum allowed quantity.
